name: Magdalena Bicz
body:
### About

* Tech savvy, process oriented and creative thought-leader
* Creating worker-friendly and effective office environments
* Bridging effectively Office Administration, Accounting and Finance
* Building fast-growth startups and bringing ideas to established enterprises
* Creating experiences
* Cultivating cooperation and personal growth
* Supporting the business, managing talents via HR processes
* Operating in multinational, multicultural and distributed teams
* Helping others achieve greatness
* Agile is not just a buzz word 


### Contact
* magdalena+jobs@bicz.net
